languages.text: {n}На вас с подозрением взирает простолюдин в потрепанной робе со скверно побритой рожей. В руках он сжимает авторужье, готовое, кажется, развалиться от неосторожной перезарядки. Прищурившись, мужчина интересуется:{/n} "Вы хто? Бандиты?"

traits.locale_text: {n}На вас с подозрением взирает простолюдин в потрепанной робе со скверно побритой рожей. В руках он сжимает авторужье, готовое, кажется, развалиться от неосторожной перезарядки. Прищурившись, мужчина интересуется:{/n} "Вы хто? Бандиты?"
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: {n}A poorly shaved commoner in worn coveralls eyes you with suspicion. He is clutching an autogun that looks like it is one careless reload away from falling apart. The man narrows his eyes and enquires,{/n} "Oi! Who are you lot? Yer not bandits, are you?"
languages.original_text: {n}На вас с подозрением взирает простолюдин в потрепанной робе со скверно побритой рожей. В руках он сжимает авторужье, готовое, кажется, развалиться от неосторожной перезарядки. Прищурившись, мужчина интересуется:{/n} "Вы хто? Бандиты?"

traits.locale_text: {n}A poorly shaved commoner in worn coveralls eyes you with suspicion. He is clutching an autogun that looks like it would fall apart if someone were to reload without being extremely careful. The old man narrows his eyes and says,{/n} "Oi! Who are you lot? Yer not bandits, are you?"
traits.speaker: OldMan

Yer not bandits, are you?"

traits.speaker: OldMan

traits.speaker: OldMan

traits.speaker: OldMan

traits.locale_text: {n}A poorly shaved commoner in worn coveralls eyes you with suspicion. He is clutching an autogun that looks like it is one careless reload away from falling apart. The man narrows his eyes and enquires,{/n} "Oi! Who are you lot? Yer not bandits, are you?"
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: {n}一个穿着破旧工作服、胡子刮得乱七八糟的老人以怀疑的目光看着你。他手里拿着一把自动步枪，看起来好像随时随地都会散架。那个人眯起眼睛，询问道。{/n}“喂！你们是谁？该不会是土匪吧？”
languages.original_text: {n}A poorly shaved commoner in worn coveralls eyes you with suspicion. He is clutching an autogun that looks like it is one careless reload away from falling apart. The man narrows his eyes and enquires,{/n} "Oi! Who are you lot? Yer not bandits, are you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}一个穿着破旧工作服、胡子刮得乱七八糟的老人以怀疑的目光看着你。他手里拿着一把自动步枪，看起来好像随时随地都会散架。那个人眯起眼睛，询问道。{/n}“喂！你们是谁？该不会是土匪吧？”
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: {n}一般市民が、疑いの目であなたを見ている。男は髭を剃り残していて、着古したつなぎを着ている。オートガンを握りしめているが、つい弾を込めすぎたのか、バラバラになりそうだ。彼は目を細めると、質問した。{/n}「おい、どこのどいつだ！てめぇ、盗賊じゃねぇだろうな？」
languages.original_text: {n}A poorly shaved commoner in worn coveralls eyes you with suspicion. He is clutching an autogun that looks like it is one careless reload away from falling apart. The man narrows his eyes and enquires,{/n} "Oi! Who are you lot? Yer not bandits, are you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}一般市民が、疑いの目であなたを見ている。男は髭を剃り残していて、着古したつなぎを着ている。オートガンを握りしめているが、つい弾を込めすぎたのか、バラバラになりそうだ。彼は目を細めると、質問した。{/n}「おい、どこのどいつだ！てめぇ、盗賊じゃねぇだろうな？」
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: {n}Un plebeyo mal afeitado con un mono gastado te mira con sospecha. Sujeta un rifle automático que parece estar a punto de caerse a trozos si alguien mueve lo que no es. El hombre entrecierra los ojos y pregunta:{/n} «¡Es! ¿Quiénes sois? No seréis bandidos, ¿verdad?».
languages.original_text: {n}A poorly shaved commoner in worn coveralls eyes you with suspicion. He is clutching an autogun that looks like it is one careless reload away from falling apart. The man narrows his eyes and enquires,{/n} "Oi! Who are you lot? Yer not bandits, are you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Un plebeyo mal afeitado con un mono gastado te mira con sospecha. Sujeta un rifle automático que parece estar a punto de caerse a trozos si alguien mueve lo que no es. El hombre entrecierra los ojos y pregunta:{/n} «¡Es! ¿Quiénes sois? No seréis bandidos, ¿verdad?».
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: {n}Ein schlecht rasierter Mann aus dem Pöbel in einem zerschlissenen Overall beäugt dich misstrauisch. Er hält ein Sturmgewehr in der Hand, das aussieht, als würde es beim nächsten unvorsichtigen Nachladen auseinanderfallen. Der Mann verengt die Augen und ruft:{/n} "Oi! Wer seid Ihr Pack? Ihr seid doch keine Banditen, oder?"
languages.original_text: {n}A poorly shaved commoner in worn coveralls eyes you with suspicion. He is clutching an autogun that looks like it is one careless reload away from falling apart. The man narrows his eyes and enquires,{/n} "Oi! Who are you lot? Yer not bandits, are you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein schlecht rasierter Mann aus dem Pöbel in einem zerschlissenen Overall beäugt dich misstrauisch. Er hält ein Sturmgewehr in der Hand, das aussieht, als würde es beim nächsten unvorsichtigen Nachladen auseinanderfallen. Der Mann verengt die Augen und ruft:{/n} "Oi! Wer seid Ihr Pack? Ihr seid doch keine Banditen, oder?"
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: {n}Un homme mal rasé, vêtu d'une salopette usée, vous dévisage avec suspicion. Il tient dans les mains un fusil d'assaut qui semble à deux doigts de tomber en morceaux. Il vous hèle en plissant les yeux.{/n} « Hé ! Vous êtes qui, vous ? Pas des bandits, j'espère ! »
languages.original_text: {n}A poorly shaved commoner in worn coveralls eyes you with suspicion. He is clutching an autogun that looks like it is one careless reload away from falling apart. The man narrows his eyes and enquires,{/n} "Oi! Who are you lot? Yer not bandits, are you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Un homme mal rasé, vêtu d'une salopette usée, vous dévisage avec suspicion. Il tient dans les mains un fusil d'assaut qui semble à deux doigts de tomber en morceaux. Il vous hèle en plissant les yeux.{/n} « Hé ! Vous êtes qui, vous ? Pas des bandits, j'espère ! »
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: {n}Eski iş tulumları içindeki kötü tıraşlı avam, sana şüpheyle bakıyor. Şarjörü bir kez daha değişse dağılacakmış gibi duran ototüfeğini sıkıca kavramış. Adam, gözlerini kısarak soruyor.{/n} "Alo! Kimsiniz, necisiniz? Haydut değilsiniz he mi?"
languages.original_text: {n}A poorly shaved commoner in worn coveralls eyes you with suspicion. He is clutching an autogun that looks like it is one careless reload away from falling apart. The man narrows his eyes and enquires,{/n} "Oi! Who are you lot? Yer not bandits, are you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Eski iş tulumları içindeki kötü traşlı avam, sana şüpheyle bakıyor. Şarjörü bir kez daha değişse dağılacakmış gibi duran otomatik silahını sıkıca kavramış. Adam, gözlerini kısarak soruyor,{/n} "Alo! Kimsiniz, necisiniz? Haydut değilsiniz he mi?"
traits.speaker: OldMan
